attributes.action: review the present Conservation Legislation of Whales, Grey Seals and other large sea mammals and help Save our Planet'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Review the present Conservation Legislation of Whales, Grey Seals and other large sea mammals and help Save our Planet'
Allow Fishermen to hunt the Whale and other dinosaurs of the deep who steal our fish. Eating meat contributes to global warming. Eating fish does not. It is healthy, improves the cognitive development and behavioural problems in children (and thus saves money on the NHS, Education and Home Office and DHSS Budgets) its expanasion would provide more employment for our fishermen. So let us eat our fish instead of the Dinosaurs of the Deep and Save our Planet for Ourselves!
